bwwExcerpt: Don't be fooled by the title of Disney's latest film-to-stage transfer. "Aladdin" may be named after its lead street urchin character, but the musical comedy that just opened at the New Amsterdam Theatre is all about one character: the Genie. That's due to the casting of the energetic James Monroe I...
